data.eml:eml: Neuropterida (Insecta: Megaloptera, Raphidioptera, Neuroptera) of Pakistan: a catalogue and faunistic review

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hassan, Muhammad Asghar, Oswald, John D., Zia, Ahmed, Liu, Xingyue (2019): Neuropterida (Insecta: Megaloptera, Raphidioptera, Neuroptera) of Pakistan: a catalogue and faunistic review. Zootaxa 4686 (4): 497-541, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4686.4.3
